fields.title: Beef Stew
fields.blurb: A hearty and rich beef stew perfect for cold days.
fields.ingredients: Beef, potatoes, carrots, onions, garlic, broth, bay leaves
fields.method: Brown beef. Add vegetables and broth. Simmer until tender.

fields.title: Chicken Alfredo
fields.blurb: Creamy Alfredo sauce with tender chicken served over pasta.
fields.ingredients: Chicken breast, pasta, heavy cream, Parmesan, garlic, butter
fields.method: Cook chicken. Make Alfredo sauce. Toss with pasta and serve.

fields.title: BBQ Ribs
fields.blurb: Tender, smoky BBQ ribs perfect for summer grilling.
fields.ingredients: Pork ribs, BBQ sauce, garlic, onion powder, paprika
fields.method: Season ribs. Bake or grill with BBQ sauce until tender.

fields.title: Lamb Curry
fields.blurb: A rich and spicy lamb curry with bold flavors.
fields.ingredients: Lamb, onions, tomatoes, garlic, ginger, curry powder, coconut milk
fields.method: Brown lamb. Saut√© onions and spices. Simmer with coconut milk.

fields.title: Pork Schnitzel
fields.blurb: A crispy and golden pork schnitzel, served with a lemon wedge.
fields.ingredients: Pork cutlets, flour, breadcrumbs, egg, lemon, parsley
fields.method: Dredge pork in flour, egg, and breadcrumbs. Fry until golden.

fields.title: Steak Frites
fields.blurb: A classic French dish with steak and crispy fries.
fields.ingredients: Ribeye steak, potatoes, garlic, butter, thyme
fields.method: Cook steak to desired doneness. Serve with crispy fries.

fields.title: Bacon-Wrapped Chicken
fields.blurb: Juicy chicken breasts wrapped in crispy bacon.
fields.method: Wrap chicken in bacon. Roast until crispy and cooked through.

fields.title: Beef Tacos
fields.blurb: Spicy ground beef in soft tortillas with fresh toppings.
fields.ingredients: Ground beef, tortillas, lettuce, cheese, salsa
fields.method: Cook beef with spices. Serve in tortillas with toppings.

fields.title: Meatball Marinara
fields.blurb: Classic Italian meatballs in marinara sauce served with spaghetti.
fields.ingredients: Ground beef, breadcrumbs, marinara sauce, spaghetti
fields.method: Make meatballs. Cook in marinara sauce. Serve with pasta.

fields.title: Chicken Parmesan
fields.blurb: Breaded chicken cutlets topped with marinara sauce and melted cheese.
fields.ingredients: Chicken cutlets, breadcrumbs, marinara sauce, mozzarella, Parmesan
fields.method: Bread and fry chicken. Top with sauce and cheese. Bake.
